dcterms:creator: O. Bernard
A. Lalande
C. Zotti
dcterms:description: The ACDC dataset consists of 100 training cases, each with two fully annotated volumes (one at end-diastole and one at end-systole), used for evaluating segmentation performance in cardiac MRI.
dcterms:title: Automatic Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge (ACDC)

dcterms:creator: V. M. Campello
P. Gkontra
C. Izquierdo
dcterms:description: The M&Ms dataset includes 150 training cases, each with end-diastole and end-systole volumes annotated, and is used for cardiac segmentation across multiple vendors and centers.
dcterms:title: Multi-Centre, Multi-Vendor and Multi-Disease Cardiac Segmentation Challenge (M&Ms)
